<p class="mp-hero-tagline">Let AI query your data. Not your database.</p>
<p class="mp-hero-desc">DreamFactory is a secure, self-hosted enterprise data access platform that provides governed API access to any data source, connecting enterprise applications and on-prem LLMs with role-based access and identity passthrough.
